response.original_title: Todos Santos Cuchumatan: Report from a Guatemalan Village
response.overview: An intimate look at everyday life in Todos Santos, a village in Guatemala's highlands, before the violence of the 1980s. The community, consisting of small family farms worked by Mayan Indians, had remained isolated until the construction of a road in the mid-1960's connecting the highlands and the coast.
response.title: Todos Santos Cuchumatan: Report from a Guatemalan Village
